meanings.definition: The state or condition of being crowded.
meanings.sent1: The crowdednesses of the bus made it hard to find a seat.
meanings.sent2: The crowdednesses of the market during the holiday season was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The crowdednesses of the elevator led to some awkward close encounters.
meanings.sent4: The crowdednesses of the city streets felt like a suffocating blanket.
meanings.sent5: The crowdednesses of the concert venue created a buzzing energy in the air.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being filled to capacity with a large number of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The crowdednesses of the classroom made it hard to move around.
meanings.sent2: The crowdednesses of the suitcase made it difficult to close.
meanings.sent3: The crowdednesses of the fridge caused items to spill out when opened.
meanings.sent4: The crowdednesses of the bookshelf resembled a game of Tetris.
meanings.sent5: The crowdednesses of the closet made it a challenge to find anything.
